articles.author: Una Hajdari
articles.title: South Africa grants Putin immunity despite international warrant - Euronews
articles.description: Russia's president was granted diplomatic immunity to attend a BRICS summit in August, despite being wanted for his involvement in alleged war crimes in Ukraine.
articles.content:

articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Scientists: South African Fossils Tell of the Struggle to Survive - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Scientists recently released a study about an ancient kind of animal that traveled 12,000 kilometers to survive bad weather conditions 250 million years ago.
articles.content:
A recent study says fossil remains of a top meat-eating animal living 250 million years ago, which had only been found in the worlds northern half, also lived in South Africa.
